main_01_001.title: Tremors in the Earth
main_01_001.description: The ground shakes beneath our feet. Speak with the Town Elder to understand these strange quakes.

side_story_001.title: The Echo's Whisper
side_story_001.description: Blacksmith Brond has noticed strange vibrations coming from the wilderness. Investigate the area and gather Echo Shards from the crystalline growths.

main_01_002.title: Echoes from Below
main_01_002.description: Corruption is seeping from the Watchtower basement. Clear out the Echo Mites gathered there.

main_01_003.title: Crystalline Seepage
main_01_003.description: Gather shards of the crystalline corruption for the town's blacksmith to study. Defeat monsters to collect Crystal Shards that drop from their remains.

main_01_004.title: The Elder's Request
main_01_004.description: Deliver the gathered shards to the Blacksmith so he can determine their frequency.

main_01_005.title: Resonant Frequencies
main_01_005.description: The blacksmith is sounding the shards. Stay nearby and defend the shop from drawn Echo creatures.

main_01_006.title: The Path Chosen
main_01_006.description: Speak with Trainer Garen to choose your path and receive your initial training.

main_01_007.title: Mana Instability
main_01_007.description: Strange fluxes of mana are appearing. Stabilize them before they attract more creatures.

main_01_008.title: Into the Depths
main_01_008.description: The mana disturbances trace back to the Watchtower basement. Enter the dungeon beneath the Watchtower in the wilderness to investigate the source of the quakes.

main_01_009.title: Infested Veins
main_01_009.description: The Watchtower basement is crawling with Echo Rats drawn to the corruption. Clear them out before descending further.

main_01_010.title: The Forgotten
main_01_010.description: The miners who were trapped in the deeper levels of the Watchtower have... returned. Descend further into the Watchtower dungeon in the wilderness and lay them to rest.

main_01_011.title: Solidified Corruption
main_01_011.description: The corruption in the Watchtower's lower depths is forming hard crystalline structures. Mine 10 Echo Crystals from the floors below.

main_01_012.title: The First Fragment
main_01_012.description: A massive creature has nested near the breach in the floor of the deepest Watchtower level. Defeat the Echo Beholder to reach the first fragment of the Aegis.

main_01_013.title: Claiming the Shard
main_01_013.description: The Beholder is slain. Recover the Shard of Resonance from its nest.

main_01_014.title: Elder's Wisdom
main_01_014.description: Return to the surface and present the Shard of Resonance to Elder Malik.

main_01_015.title: Strengthening the Aegis
main_01_015.description: Take the shard to the Ancient Obelisk at the town center and restore its power.

main_01_016.title: Unexpected Feedback
main_01_016.description: The restoration triggered a massive release of energy! Survive the intense Obelisk backlash.

main_01_017.title: The Echo's Warning
main_01_017.description: Constructs have emerged from the light. Defeat 20 Backlash constructs to stabilize the ritual.

main_01_018.title: Deep Scan
main_01_018.description: The Aegis needs data on the world's status. Travel across the wilderness to calibrate the sensors.

main_01_019.title: Resonance Established
main_01_019.description: Your connection with the Aegis is growing. Reach Level 15 to finalize your attunement.

main_01_020.title: Chapter Final
main_01_020.description: Chapter 1 is complete. Prepare yourself for the journey to the next corrupted region.

main_02_001.title: Mysterious Arrival
main_02_001.description: The tremors have ceased, but a strange energy lingers in the town square. Captain Thorne needs your help to investigate.

main_02_002.title: Arcane Insight
main_02_002.description: Captain Thorne suggests consulting Mage Elara about the strange energy resonance found in the town square.

main_02_003.title: The Source
main_02_003.description: Mage Elara has identified the source of the corruption as ancient ruins in the wilderness. Retrieve the artifact fragment she sensed.

main_02_004.title: Suspects Trail
main_02_004.description: The artifact fragment suggests someone tampered with the seal. Interrogate the suspects: Guard Bram, Scholar Seren, and Merchant Lysa.

main_02_005.title: The Traitor's Trail
main_02_005.description: Evidence points to a traitor seeking to harness the corruption. Track them down in the wilderness before they can escape.

main_02_006.title: Confrontation
main_02_006.description: The traitor's mercenaries (Orcs) have been spotted roaming the Wilderness. Defeat 5 Orcs to thin their numbers and clear the way.

main_02_007.title: Dark Orders
main_02_007.description: The mercenaries were carrying encrypted orders signed by 'General Vex.' Collect 3 sets of orders from Orc Captains for Elara to decode.

main_02_008.title: The Hidden Path
main_02_008.description: Elara decoded the orders. They reveal a hidden entrance beneath the Traitor's Camp. Find the Camp Key on a traitor lieutenant to access it.

main_02_009.title: Breaking the Gate
main_02_009.description: The stronghold gate is heavily guarded. Defeat 4 Elite Guards to breach the defenses.

main_02_010.title: Into the Wolf's Den
main_02_010.description: The path is clear. Enter the Traitor's Stronghold dungeon to stop their plans.

main_02_011.title: Stolen Supplies
main_02_011.description: The traitor has been stealing town supplies. Recover 10 Stolen Crates from the dungeon.

main_02_012.title: The Lieutenant
main_02_012.description: Vex's lieutenant, Malagor, guards the inner sanctum. Defeat him to proceed.

main_02_013.title: Dark Rituals
main_02_013.description: Malagor was channeling power to Vex. Destroy 5 Ritual Altars in the dungeon to weaken the General.

main_02_014.title: The Inner Sanctum
main_02_014.description: The path to Vex is open. He stands before a tear in reality. Reach the Level 2 Stronghold to face him.

main_02_015.title: The General's Fall
main_02_015.description: Vex reveals he was merely a pawn, promised power by the 'Void.' Defeat General Vex before he widens the tear.

main_02_016.title: The Void Seal
main_02_016.description: Vex falls, but the tear is unstable. Use the Shard of Resonance to seal it temporarily.

main_02_017.title: Recovering the Sigil
main_02_017.description: Vex dropped a strange Sigilâ€”the key to the true threat. Recover the Void Sigil.

main_02_018.title: Return to Hearthwell
main_02_018.description: Return to Thorne with the news of Vex's betrayal and death.

main_02_019.title: The Warning
main_02_019.description: Show the Void Sigil to Mage Elara. She needs to examine it.

main_02_020.title: Chapter Final
main_02_020.description: The Void is coming. Complete Chapter 2 and prepare for the Void Dimension.

main_03_001.title: The Dark Seal
main_03_001.description: The traitor was seeking the Void Key. Speak to Elder Malik to secure the key before the enemy can regroup.

side_kill_001.title: First Steps
side_kill_001.description: Kill 15 monsters to prove your worth.

side_collect_001.title: Treasure Hunter
side_collect_001.description: Collect items from defeated monsters to prove your resourcefulness.

side_level_001.title: Rising Power
side_level_001.description: Reach level 2 to unlock new abilities.

side_kill_002.title: Monster Hunter
side_kill_002.description: Defeat 15 monsters to earn the title of Hunter.

side_survive_002.title: Endurance Test
side_survive_002.description: Survive for 5 minutes in the dangerous world.

side_survive_004.title: Ironclad
side_survive_004.description: Survive for 15 minutes in the wilderness.

side_level_004.title: Heroic Growth
side_level_004.description: Reach level 10 to prove your capability.

side_level_005.title: Paragon
side_level_005.description: Achieve level 15 and become a paragon of strength.

side_level_006.title: Legendary Status
side_level_006.description: Reach level 20 to become a legend.

side_level_007.title: Godlike
side_level_007.description: Reach level 25. Few mortals ever achieve this power.
